# defaultLightAccountVersion

Get the default light account version for the given light account type

## Import

```ts
import { defaultLightAccountVersion } from "@account-kit/smart-contracts";
```

## Parameters

### type

`LightAccountType`

- the light account type to get the default version for

## Returns

`GetLightAccountVersion<TLightAccountType>`
the default version for the given light account type
